name: Candlelight (itch) (Pietro)
description:
One night each year, the pumpkins roam the earth looking for fun, but if they go to sleep, they'll wake up next morning as just a regular pumpkin. Try to have fun for as long as you can hold! Having the lights off makes it harder to stay up.

Game made in 05:15h total

Roll using the left/right arrows, jump pressing up. Hold space near a candle to light it  up.

Github page
